transcription:
The rights of nature are those which nature points out to all men.
Speaking of hell Cicero says you will not find an Old Woman weak enough to believe it.
Humon nature have been always devoted to errors. But those errors not always the cause of blood shed.

Mary the wise of Old was thought
A mighty woman of worth
Her plans was to a Country ?ought
The Empire of the Earth
At length she died and was no more
Her plans was all for gotton
Her fame that was at a Distant shore ?
Was with her Dead & rotton


There rose a mighty man of worth
Henry the word of old
pageContext.category: Everett D. Graff Collection of Western Americana; U.S. Western Expansion
pageContext.title: Robert McKnight literary fragments, 1810s
